item.title: pmunn
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Thanks for putting The 7 out there — its so user friendly that even someone with very limited web experience like myself can build a site. For my first theme I'm lucky I found yours!

item.title: deanb
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: All I can say is Wow! After years of building sites by hand I thought I would try out a Wordpress theme. So glad I choose yours, it looks fantastic and has been very easy to adapt to my requirements. It works perfectly on every device which I have tested physically and also via browserstack. Anyone worried about the themes speed, should not be. Put it on a decent server close to your audience and it will fly, my tests show 1.4 second loading times thats without any Cache plug ins. The support has been very fast and professional. As a long time user of Envato (they was based in a garage, when I joined) I can easily say this is my favourite product I have ever purchased!

item.title: lordlucan101
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: My two year search is over! I have tried over 30 themes from Themeforest, many of them occupying the top 10, but The7 is by far the best I have used. That’s not to say the other themes are poor, it’s just that The7 is the fastest, easiest to make a site look professional (I have no idea about coding html etc) and the demo material is second to none. I can’t believe these guys charge $55; well it’s definitely the best $55 dollars I’ve ever spent on a product. Thank you so much Dream-Theme. This site so much deserves to be number 1.

item.title: AFroggatt
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This theme is great. Highly customizable. Dream-Theme have spent the time and attention to design, feature set and integration with other plugins. Updates include more features and are regular. Support is timely and on point. Thanks a ton.

item.title: 1website4me
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The 7 is an AMAZING theme! I've purchased countless themes over the past years, and this has got to be one of the most versitile and time saving ones I've ever come across.

item.title: Ringdal
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: It’s simple. This theme is AWESOME ! Best theme I have ever seen and I have investigated n seen many!

item.title: CypherUK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This theme, is without doubt, one of, if not THE best theme I have ever had the pleasure of working with. The support/updates are excellent. So easy to use and work with. If you are ‘thinking’ of purchasing this theme, think no more and hit the buy button! After my previous purchase from another developer turned into a lemon, this theme and the development team have restored my faith. Thank You guys!

item.title: Jason Klass
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: This is the best, most powerful theme I've ever used and it keeps getting even better with every update!

item.title: Babahed
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: In the hundreds of Wordpress themes that I had to use, it is the most accomplished. No doubt about it. So many possibilities and flexibility. Bravo.

item.title: peterstocks
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I just rated your theme 5 stars. The theme is amazing and your tech support excellent is too. Thank you.

item.title: Landing page
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
[vc_row anchor="#home" margin_top="-35" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="repeat-y" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="true" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.2" min_height="0" type="1" bg_image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/landing-bg02.jpg" bg_color="#2b4696" enable_parallax="false"][vc_column width="1/1"][rev_slider_vc alias="land"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#demos" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="40" padding_bottom="40" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Need a versatile theme that can do everything from blog to corporate portal? With power to customize every aspect of design and layout? Without writing a single line of code?

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]

The7 delivers!

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="43"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_column_text]

[dt_button size="big" animation="none" icon="fa fa-arrow-circle-right" icon_align="right" color="" link="http://the7.dream-demo.com" target_blank="true"]View full demo[/dt_button]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/1"][vc_column_text]

But do not take our word for it! Check out how different can be sites built on The7 theme:

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="40"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Corporate / Business
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
One-page website
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Blog / News website
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Creative / Portfolio
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
Photography
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_column_text]
OnLine Shop
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="45"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#knowstripe" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0" min_height="0" type="4" bg_color="#23272a"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="36"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text]
This landing page is powered by The7 WordPress Theme.
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="15"][vc_column_text]
We used “Microsite” page template, Slider Revolution, some images and shortcodes. No additional line of code was written. You’ll find this page in dummy content that comes in themes package.
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="36"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="centre" padding="0" margin_top="-9" margin_bottom="0" margin_right="0" margin_left="20" width="244" animation="left" media="" image_alt="vc" hd_image="" image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/didyouknow.gif"][/dt_fancy_image][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="24"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#design" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" type="2"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Customize everything. Make your site unique!

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]

No theme around offers such a vide range of customization options. The7 allows you to customize almost every aspect of its appearance via handy theme options panel.

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="10"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]All colors & backgrounds are 100% editable[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]2 design styles: iOS7 & Minimalist [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]4 menu layouts & 3 menu hover styles [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]3 header layouts: normal, overlapping, transparent[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]4 page title layouts: disabled, left, right, centred[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Unique fancy headers (titles) for all posts & pages [/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]3 sidebar background styles [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Wide & boxed layouts[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]3 button styles: iOS7, flat & 3D [dt_highlight color="green"]new[/dt_highlight][/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]6 customisable portfolio & photo albums hover effects[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Easy to use colored content stripes (sections)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]700+ Google Web Fonts + FontAwesome[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="85"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#layout" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="true" bg_attachment="true" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0" bg_image="http://the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2013/12/video_bg.png"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Infinite page layouts with Visual Layout Builder

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text]

The7 comes with drag&drop Visual Layout Builder. You can create almost any imaginable page layout with the help of 60+ layout elements.

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][vc_column_text][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_column_text]

[dt_button size="big" animation="none" icon="fa fa-play-circle" icon_align="right" color="" link="http://www.screenr.com/5GnH" target_blank="true"]Watch screencast[/dt_button]

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="45"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Rows and columns, colored sections[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Widgetised sidebar + custom widgets[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Gaps, dividers & separators[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Lists, quotes, tooltips, buttons[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Banners, teasers, fancy media[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Message boxes, call to action area[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Progress bars, pie charts & counters[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Top & side tabs, accordion & toggle[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Portfolio (masonry, grid, slider)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Blog (small, masonry, list)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Testimonials, team, clients[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Google map[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Contact form[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Slideshows (Royal, Layer, Revolution)[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Posts carousel[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Social icons & share buttons[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="90"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#vcstripe" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0" min_height="0" type="4" bg_color="#23272a"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="36"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="3/4"][vc_column_text]
In its core layout builder is powered by Visual Composer - most popular, reliable and trusted premium drag&drop page building plugin for WordPress. It's being significantly improved and extended to host all the unique The7 layout elements.
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="15"][vc_column_text]
Normally it costs $30, but you’re getting it FREE as a part of The7 theme!
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="36"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/4"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="centre" padding="0" margin_top="3" margin_bottom="0" margin_right="0" margin_left="0" width="265" animation="left" media="" image_alt="vc" hd_image="" image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/visual-composer-img.gif"][/dt_fancy_image][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="34"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#features" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]

Key features

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="60"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-resp.jpg"]

Responsive. Fluid. Retina-Ready.

Your site will always look sharp and utilize 100% of screen estate on every device. There are no jerky “responsiveness points”. Plus The7 features adaptive navigation menu on smaller screen sizes.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-seoimg.jpg"]

SEO-optimized

Themes valid HTML5 code meets best SEO practices. Theme is 100% compatible with industry-leading SEO plugins like “All on One SEO Pack” and “SEO by Yoast”.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-woocommerce.jpg"]

WooCommerce Support Out of the Box

That’s right – no need to mess with WooCommerce styling to fit your site perfectly. The7 will apply all required styles based on your design automatically![/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-lang.jpg"]

Translation and Multilingual ready

The7 is 100% translation ready and fully compatible with WPML.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-slider.jpg"]

Exclusive Slideshows

The7 features two slideshows developed exclusively for it: Porthole and 3D. Layer Slider, Metro (based on Swiper) and Revolution slider were heavily customized to fit theme perfectly.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-header.jpg"]

Multiple Header Options. Fancy Headers.

Make your pages, posts and projects stand out with individual headers. Choose one of 5 exclusive slideshows or a fancy header (3 layouts available).[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-skins.jpg"]

6 Ready-Made Skins & 2 styles

We’ve included 6 ready-made skins in different color schemes for different purposes. They can be a great starting point for your unique custom design. Moreover now you can switch from iOS7 to Minimalist style to get even cleaner and more universal look.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-save.jpg"]

More value for money - save $77!

The7 comes bundled with premium plugins: Layer Slider, Slider Revolution, Visual Composer, Go Pricing tables. So you are getting even more awesome stuff while saving extra $77.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-plugins.jpg"]

Tested for compatibility with most popular plugins

Contact form 7, WPML, All in One Calendar, Events manager Pro, Gravity Forms, WooCommerce, SEO by Yoast, All in One Seo Pack, W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache, JetPack, Luv Comments, Disqus, Geo Post, Ultimate Maintenance Mode, Jooseok Oh, NextGEN Gallery, etc.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="3" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/landing-support.jpg"]

Premium-class support for free!

Faced a problem? No worries – we have knowledge-base, interactive troubleshooter and our premium-class customer support service is always ready to help you.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="40"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="20"][vc_column_text]

Still not impressed? There's more!

[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="60"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" bullet_position="top" dividers="false"] [dt_list_item image=""]Fully responsive and optimized for mobile devices + convenient mobile menu (iOS 5, 6 & 7 and Android 4.3 & 4.4).[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Retina displays ready (and extensively tested on RMBP).[/dt_list_item][dt_list_item image=""]Powerful theme customization tools: customize everything via simple and intuitive interface in your admin panel.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]2 design styles: iOS7 & Minimalist.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]10 amazing skins for different purposes included.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Visual Layout Builder based on modified Visual Composer.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]5 awesome sliders: Layer Slider, Slider Revolution, Porthole, Metro, 3D.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]UNIQUE page template: Microsite. May be used for landing pages, one-page-sites, blank pages,.. even sterling sites-in-site! Features: - Select custom menu. - Enable / disable top bar, header, floating menu, bottom bar. - Use custom logos, logo links and favicon. - Enable / disable beautiful page loading. - Choose wide or boxed layout. - Custom CSS field. - All regular options like header, slideshow, sidebars etc. settings are also available. [/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]We supercharged WP Custom Menus (now it’s Mega Menu)! Features: - Icons (custom images or icon-font). - Subtitles. - Multiple menu rows / columns. Theme Options > Header options: - Enable / disable frames & backgrounds in main menu. - Enable / disable arrow level indicators for main menu and drop down menus. - Icon size settings.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Striped backgrounds; Parallax and Video Stripes.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Create pages for different types of content in 3 clicks: create page, select template and hit “publish”. Boom, your page is already there! No additional setup required.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Custom post types to store different types of your content: slideshows; photo albums; portfolio; team; testimonials; partners, clients, etc.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]3 button styles: iOS7, flat & 3D.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]3 sidebar background styles.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/2"][vc_column_text][dt_list style="1" bullet_position="top" dividers="false"][dt_list_item image=""]Plenty of Blog, Portfolio & Galleries layouts. You can choose: - masonry, grid or list view; - justified grid layout for portfolio, albums and galleries; - 1, 2, 3 or 4 columns; - plus enable or disable sidebar.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]12+1 page templates: - Default Template (for general pages); - Blog – list; - Blog – masonry; - Albums (photos & videos; 2-level gallery) – masonry & grid; - Albums – justified grid; - Gallery (photos & videos; 1-level gallery) – masonry & grid; - Gallery – justified grid; - Portfolio – list; - Portfolio – masonry & grid; - Portfolio – justified grid; - Microsite (can be used for one-page site, landing page, etc.); - Team; - Testimonials.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Multiple header options for pages, posts and projects. Choose from 5 Slideshows or 3 Fancy Headers layouts.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]4 menu layouts & 3 menu hover styles.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Password protected posts in Blog, Photo Albums, Portfolio, Media.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Unlimited widget areas.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Tested for compatibility with most popular plugins: Contact form 7, WPML, All in One Calendar, Events manager Pro, WooCommerce, SEO by Yoast, All in One Seo Pack, W3 Total Cache, WP Super Cache, JetPack, Luv Comments, Disqus, Geo Post, Ultimate Maintenance Mode, Jooseok Oh, NextGEN Gallery, etc.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Plethora of custom shortcodes with wide range of settings.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Custom widgets.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Lots of social icons.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Like buttons in blog, portfolio and media.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Option to disable responsiveness.[/dt_list_item] [dt_list_item image=""]Integrated Google Fonts.[/dt_list_item] [/dt_list][/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][dt_gap height="80"][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#updatestripe" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="center" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0" min_height="0" bg_color="#23272a" type="4"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="36"][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width="2/3"][vc_column_text]
Regular updates. Built in collaboration with our users.
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="20"][vc_column_text]
The7 is one of the most innovative and fastest evolving themes on ThemeForest. Many features and layout elements that were first introduced in The7 are only making their way to other themes. Design customization tools are still unprecedented, and cannot be found in any other theme. Many layouts, sliders, scrollers, etc are unique! [dt_gap height="3" /] But more important, we’re moving The7 in the direction that you define. That’s why so many awesome stuff in The7 first started as users feature requests!
[/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="36"][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width="1/3"][vc_column_text][dt_fancy_image type="" style="1" lightbox="0" align="centre" padding="0" margin_top="5" margin_bottom="0" margin_right="0" margin_left="0" width="290" animation="left" media="" image_alt="vc" hd_image="" image="http://demos.the7.dream-demo.com/wp-content/uploads/2014/03/updates-img.gif"][/dt_fancy_image][/vc_column_text][dt_gap height="34"][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row anchor="#testimonials" margin_top="0" margin_bottom="0" padding_left="40" padding_right="40" bg_position="top" bg_repeat="no-repeat" bg_cover="false" bg_attachment="false" padding_top="0" padding_bottom="0" parallax_speed="0.1" min_height="0"][vc_column width="1/1"][dt_gap height="70"][vc_column_text]
